page.title: 10Employment.
page.content: An Interview With A Stable-Lad. What do you like doing best? Going to the races. What do you dislike? Mucking out. How many lads work with you? 12 and 1 girl. How many horses are there? 33. How many do you look after? 3. What is your ambition? To win the pools. Do you go racing often? Yes. Where? Race tracks all over the North. Do your horses do well? Yes. Is your job dangerous? Yes. What do the horses eat? Corn, nuts, barley, bran,honey,garlic & vitamins. How much does it cost to own a race-horse? Â£100 per week. How much would a race-horse cost? About Â£10,000. Would you like to be a trainer? No. When do you start work? I rise at 6.30am.-Go to work-Muck out 7.30am. breakfast; 8.am-ride out 3 times. 12.00 lunch. Return 4.pm. Muck out;Rub horses; feed; finish at 6pm.
